column2:
"I received the report.
I'll give you these photon crystals
as a reward for your achievement."

"With this one, you can receive the
mission again if you exceed the given time."

"Photon crystals are extremely
useful. So, many people try to get them
knowing the missions are too difficult."

"Never forget that you only
have that one body.
I ask you not to push your luck."
